spec_data.Name: php-pear-DB-QueryTool
spec_data.Description:
This package is an OO-abstraction to the SQL-Query language, it provides
methods such as setWhere, setOrder, setGroup, setJoin, etc. to easily
build queries.

spec_data.Summary: An OO-interface for easily retrieving and modifying data in a DB
